segments.text: I see the woman is drying dishes, but the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water is pouring onto the floor, and it's making a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sad that she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies, and it makes me a bit sad to see them being sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, and it looks like he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just waiting for a cookie, and she looks a bit left out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen seems a bit chaotic right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks nice, but it's sad that no one is paying attention to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think everyone in this scene needs to be more aware of their surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR
